text: @DPJHodges Yes there fucking was, we were only allowed out for one hour a day to exercise and told to stay close to home, and that's if we weren't infected. There were police with drones in the peaks and stopping people. And you stand here defending Dominic "coronavirus" Cummings' UK tour?
